title: Out of the additional FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI, 50% may be availed by utilizing TDR (without pay
clause_text: Out of the additional FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI, 50% may be availed by utilizing TDR (without payment of premium), provided that the utilization of such TDR will be allowed as per the option of the owner/developer
